item.title: SharePoint, Approve Selected List Items
item.description: SharePoint provides Out of the box JavaScript Libraries. The List Views functions are described in the post with an example how to apply some of the functions CountSelectedItems(ctx); return count of selected items in view SelectRowByIndex(ctx,1,true); selects first item in list view DeselectAllItems(ctx, tab.rows, false);deselects all items in view SelectRibbonTab(“Ribbon.ListItem”,true); displays the listitem ribbon The code below can be copied into a script editor web part on a list view page.
